actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on series E and EE United States savings bonds received by individuals who have attained age 65.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the interest on series E and EE United States savings bonds received by individuals who have attained age 65 before the close of the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on series E and EE United States savings bonds received by individuals who have attained age 65.
